tool_description: Transport iFlows of SAP Cloud Platform Integration (CPI) to other packages or to other tenants.
name: SAP CPI Transport iFlows
title: SAP CPI Transport iFlows

api_list.name: transport
api_list.description: Transport iFlows between packages (even if in different tenants)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sap-cpi-transport-iflows.p.rapidapi.com/transport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sap-cpi-transport-iflows.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://sap-cpi-transport-iflows.p.rapidapi.com/transport"
